default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Cinnabar, former supervisor of the private military company Serpent Eye. Anything concerning security, I should be of help.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: So this is how you hone your abilities... Sinners sure are special.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: No more necessary sacrifices. This power will protect everyone.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Stay behind me.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Rest assured, we're safe now.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: I'll hold them off, you get out of here now. Run!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: I'll protect them!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: No... Not yet, not when they're still here...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Welcome back, Chief. There have been no irregular activities in the Bureau while you were away.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: As of now, I have a 100% assignment completion rate. You may rest assured that I will keep you safe.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: My seniors at Serpent Eye are the best teachers I've ever had. The things they've taught me are way more useful than the professional knowledge taught in the police academy.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: This is a GH-2 Shield Generator, custom-made high-end stuff from the Research Institute, very reliable. One thing though, it's got a ton of parts inside, hence a real pain to repair.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I was once lost too, about what I should protect, and how to do it. But after that incident, I've found my answer.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: In the past, besides protecting the big shots of Paradeisos, I often did safety assessment for large organizations. As for MBCC... things are more complicated. My previous experience is not quite applicable here.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I've never protected anyone over such a long period. It's like I'm your personal bodyguard. But well... I do like this job.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Ever since leaving Serpent Eye, I haven't met any comrades I can count on in a long time... It is my honor to fight beside you.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Hmm... Where did I put my bulletproof plate?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Please keep an appropriate distance... I can't perform my tasks properly if you do that.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Do you need close protection? Understood.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: No problem. I'll get it done in no time.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Mission accomplished. Hit me up whenever you need me.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Security leveled up.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Your command, please.

special_escort.title: Obtain Attire
special_escort.text: It's an honor to take part in this escort mission to the Rust. I've been looking forward to spending more time with you... Sorry... I... I just wanted you to know how happy I am.

special_escort.title: Greeting
special_escort.text: There you are, Chief. Everything is ready. We can go now.

special_escort.title: Ordinary Contact 1
special_escort.text: Please tell me if you're tired. Don't worry. I'll clear a safe resting area for you.

special_escort.title: Ordinary Contact 2
special_escort.text: Be careful! Rockfalls and landslides are common around the Rust. Please stay close to me.

special_escort.title: Idle
special_escort.text: Get some rest, Chief. No matter how long you need, I'll be by your side.

special_escort.title: Annoyed
special_escort.text: You seem out of breath. Did you notice anything unusual?

special_escort.title: Special Attention
special_escort.text: The Rust is indeed dangerous. But don't worry, I won't let any harm come to youâ€”it's my duty.

courteous_call.title: Obtain Attire
courteous_call.text: Traveling by horse might seem a bit... too much, but it's a gesture from Miss Faye. She insisted we uphold the prestige of the MBCC... I can't just disregard her kind intentions.

courteous_call.title: Level Up
courteous_call.text: I've been honing my horsemanship. It won't be a bumpy ride, I promise.

courteous_call.title: Greeting
courteous_call.text: It's time, Chief. I'm here to escort you to the party. Tonight, I'm the knight only for you.

courteous_call.title: Ordinary Contact 1
courteous_call.text: Would you like to pet him? It's okay, he's a gentle boy. Here, try riding him. Don't worry, I'll protect you.

courteous_call.title: Ordinary Contact 2
courteous_call.text: This look sacrifices a bit of functionality for aesthetics and does look a bit constricted and cumbersome... But rest assured, I will make sure you are unscathed no matter what happens.

courteous_call.title: Idle
courteous_call.text: Shh, easy there... Are you feeling thirsty?

courteous_call.title: Annoyed
courteous_call.text: Ahem... Please don't mess up these decorations. It's a little time-consuming to wear them. After the party is over, I will take them off and give them to you, you can examine them however you want.

courteous_call.title: Special Attention
courteous_call.text: This outfit suits me? Thanks... I'm glad to know you like it.
